messages.title: RASHID SAYS...
messages.content: As your MP, I will stand up for what matters.

messages.title: THIS ELECTION ISN'T ABOUT THE NEXT 5 YEARS. IT'S ABOUT THE NEXT 50 YEARS.
messages.content: Every Green vote on 8th June will help make that vision a reality.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment.
To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services.
To put power back in your hands through a citizens' democracy.

issues.brexitEurope: The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit.
issues.economy: To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment.
issues.environment: To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment.
issues.governance: To put power back in your hands through a citizens' democracy.

housing.content: To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm a father of three, a mentor to many, an educational consultant and film maker. I was introduced to politics when my Brixton estate was demolished in a regeneration program. Cuts to services, library closures and a squeeze on local business is fuelling inequality. An unequal society is an unstable society. A lack of opportunities for young people is linked to increasing gang crime. We also have some of the worst air pollution in Europe. We deserve better than this.

images.caption: Rashid Nix, Your Green Party Candidate for Dulwich and West Norwood

leaflet.additionalNotes: This publication has not been paid for by big business or corporate interests. It has been supported and funded by ordinary people.
